text: oṭṭakaiyilum (āṇ, peṇ) iruvakai, pacuvilum iruvakai (uṇṭu. Ivviruvakaikaḷiluḷḷa) āṇkaḷaiyā? (Allatu ivviru vakaikaḷiluḷḷa) peṇkaḷaiyā? Allatu ivviru vakaikaḷiluḷḷa peṇkaḷiṉ karppaṅkaḷil uḷḷavaṟṟaiyā (iṟaivaṉ) taṭai ceytirukkiṟāṉ? Ivvāṟu (taṭuttu) allāh uṅkaḷukkuk (kaṭṭaḷaiyiṭṭatākak kūṟukiṟīrkaḷē, avvāṟu avaṉ) kaṭṭaḷaiyiṭṭapōtu nīṅkaḷum muṉṉāl iruntīrkaḷā?'' Eṉṟum napiyē! Nīr avarkaḷaik kēṭpīrāka. Kaṟpaṉaiyāka allāhviṉ mītu poy kūṟi, ātāramiṉṟiyē (aṟivillāta) makkaḷai vaḻi keṭuppavaṉaiviṭa aniyāyakkāraṉ yār? Niccayamāka allāh (ittakaiya) aniyāyakkāra makkaḷai nērāṉa vaḻiyil celuttuvatillai
